title: "Ex-Head of Baidu’s Smart Car Arm Gu Weihao to Lead Great Wall Motor’s Self-Driving Unit"
excerpt: "Gu Weihao, who headed Chinese internet giant Baidu’s Intelligent Vehicle Division until 2019, will join rival Great Wall Motor’s autonomous driving subsidiary as chief executive officer, people with knowledge of the matter told Yicai Global yesterday."
